title: Steve Niles - Breath of Bones - A Tale of the Golem
description:
Surprised this one isn't here already. I've found there's really no rhyme or reason in that regard. The most random stuff has often already been uploaded, and the stuff you would just assume is here, isn't. 

----------------------------------------------------------------

Breath of Bones - A Tale of the Golem 1-3

Dark Horse, 2013, 24 pages each

Written by Steve Niles, Matt Santoro

Illustrated by Dave Wachter

The giant clay monster from Jewish legend goes on a Nazi-killing rampage in order to protect the inhabitants of a small Jewish stronghold and an injured British pilot.
